titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the amount of capital losses which may offset ordinary income.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the amount of capital losses which may offset ordinary income.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase from $3,000 to $9,000 the limitation on the deduction for the capital losses of individual taxpayers. Provides for an annual inflation adjustment of the limitation amount.
